io.micronaut.data.jdbc.operations

Class AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations<RS,PS>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.data.jdbc.operations.AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations<RS,PS>
  • Type Parameters:
    RS - The result set type
    PS - The prepared statement type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    RepositoryOperations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultJdbcRepositoryOperations

    public abstract class AbstractSqlRepositoryOperations<RS,PS>
extends java.lang.Object
implements RepositoryOperations
    Abstract SQL repository implementation not specifically bound to JDBC.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
